Texts.Chs: 当你靠近时，这件奇怪的遗物释放出了一股能量，而你沐浴其中。你感觉你变得更强壮了！^orange;[你现在可以通过连按左键/右键激活短距离冲刺。^reset;]
Texts.Eng: The strange artifact washes some sort of energy over you when you step near. You feel stronger! ^orange;[You can now double-tap left or right to activate a short dodge]^reset;

Texts.Chs: 当你靠近时，这件奇怪的遗物释放出了一股能量，而你沐浴其中。你感觉你变得更强壮了！^orange;[你现在可以通过连按左键/右键激活短距离冲刺。^reset;]
Texts.Eng: The strange artifact washes some sort of energy over you when you step near. You feel stronger! ^orange;[You can now double-tap left or right to activate a short dodge^reset;]
